title: Machine Learning
description: Machine learning models can make complex predictions that can be difficult for humans, making it an important part of many research and development projects today.

title: Web Development
description: Web development uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as libraries like React, to create dynamic and interactive websites.

title: SQL
description: SQL is used to manage relational databases, making it one of the most widely used technologies in the world.

title: CAD
description: Computer aided design is used to design and simulate mechanical systems, making it an important skill for engineering and manufacturing.

title: Java
description: One of the most commonly employed object-oriented programming languages, Java uses a virtual machine to support a write once, run anywhere policy.

title: Python
description: A high level, interpreted language, Python is popular because of its ease of use, clean syntax, and large standard library.

title: C
description: A low level, compiled language, C is used because of its speed and control even compared with newer languages.

title: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is used in web development alongside HTML and CSS, making it a part of nearly every website (including this one).
